abstract: In a Florida trial, Google data will be used to argue that explicit material doesn’t violate community values.
snippet: In a Florida trial, Google data will be used to argue that explicit material doesn’t violate community values.
lead_paragraph: Judges and jurors who must decide whether sexually explicit material is obscene are asked to use a local yardstick: does the material violate community standards?

headline.main: What’s Obscene? Google Could Have an Answer
headline.print_headline: What’s Obscene? Defendant Says Google Data Offers a Gauge
